subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: After their bus caused chaos in Stage 1 of the Tour de France, Orica-GreenEdge’s riders were fastest in Stage 4, a team time trial, and Simon Gerrans took the yellow jersey.
snippet: After their bus caused chaos in Stage 1 of the Tour de France, Orica-GreenEdge’s riders were fastest in Stage 4, a team time trial, and Simon Gerrans took the yellow jersey.
